user_query: for a film so directed towards a younger audience but I'm so glad it does this is what we need children's films to be yeah sure we'll throw in a scene of a building bending over and farting but we're also going to have our main characters mourn losses in their lives and learn how to be positive in a world of negativity my only issue with the deeper stuff was that it could have gotten its messages across just a tiny bit better and more realistically if Petey's dad who comes into play was given a tad bit more screen time he comes into the story to really give us a picture of why Petey has become a villain and then doesn't really do anything just a few more scenes building on how much he's a dead beat would have really made the generational trauma plot Point hit better but again they did not have to try that hard at all for a movie that works just fine as a popcorn flick and I'm glad he had a tiny bit of involvement because without Grampa we wouldn't have gotten Lil Petey saying yes after Petey says that guy abandoned me do you have any idea what that feels like what an absolute truth bomb my mouth dropped when Lil Petey said that as the film goes deeper Petey kind of starts slowly dropping the evil side but he's so used to it that he feels the need to keep up the act and I thought that was a clever way of giving him sympathy but still keeping him the same character I'm a sucker for the Trope of main character getting forced to raise and be annoyed by a child who ends up

entities.entity_description: Petey는 영화의 악역 캐릭터로, 아버지에게 버림받은 트라우마로 인해 악당이 되었으며, 점차 악한 면을 버리게 되지만 습관적으로 악역 연기를 유지하는 인물이다
Lil Petey는 영화의 캐릭터로, Petey가 키우게 되는 아이이며, Petey에게 "그 사람이 나를 버렸는데 그게 어떤 기분인지 알아?"라는 진실된 말을 하는 인물이다
Petey의 아버지로, Petey가 악당이 된 이유를 보여주기 위해 등장하지만 스크린 타임이 부족했던 캐릭터이다
Grampa는 영화에 등장하는 캐릭터로, 이 캐릭터가 없었다면 Lil Petey의 중요한 대사 장면이 없었을 것이다

relationships.relationship_description: Petey의 아버지는 Petey를 버렸고, 이것이 Petey가 악당이 된 원인이 되는 세대 간 트라우마를 형성했다
Petey는 Lil Petey를 키우게 되며, Lil Petey로 인해 점차 악한 면을 버리게 된다
Lil Petey는 Petey의 아버지가 Petey를 버린 것에 대해 공감하며 진실된 말을 한다
Grampa 캐릭터 덕분에 Lil Petey의 중요한 대사 장면이 가능했다
